page.title: 14 LOCAL FLOWERS
page.content: In the field we collected many flowers and weeds.We picked Barley and Wheat, left from the last crop.Shepherds Purse, Mayweed and Poppies were the most common of the weeds but near the end of the field were a lot purple bluebell type flowers called Vetch. We also saw Cow Parsley, Brooklime and Plantain. Wood Groundsel and White Mustard were two other types. On the way home we looked at some Elderberries and Wild Oats. We were very tempted to pick some of the beautiful flowers that we saw but have learnt that this is how many rare species of flower disappear from our countryside.
